data.title: WAVcast 8 // Roger O' Donnell – WAVcast – Podcast
data.meta_description: Before making his Cure debut with Disintegration (arguably one of the best albums ever recorded by the band and maybe of that time period), Roger grew up in a musical household that prepared him for a... – Listen to WAVcast 8 // Roger O' Donnell by WAVcast instantly on your tablet, phone or browser - no downloads needed.

Episodes

Hailing from Los Angeles, MMDA makes a soundtrack for the dark underbelly of queer culture. With tortured vocals and hard beats, they summon you to gyrate, grind, throb on the dance floor. Coming from their respective noise and industrial backgrounds, Peter Kalisch and Aaron December’s MMDA is a departure from their earlier work, allowing them to explore dance grooves paired with visceral walls of sound that engulfs the listener. Never ones to shy away from the taboo, they dive headfirst into a world of sexual desire, rainbow capitalism, and all the terrors and delights of being a 21st century queer.

Wednesday March 6th Distorted Disco hosts Mono No Aware(Germany/HANDS) , Threat of Innocence, Ratio Strain, and DJs Cervello Elettronico vs Nick Viola , Bractune, and Spheric.

Our other resident, Sleep Clinic contributes this mix from his new home outside of LA.

Enjoy as a complimentary soundscape to the night!

Missing episodes?

Click here to refresh the feed.

KNIVES/INSIDE/HER is a valley girl, designer, single mom and a dj of 16 years. After taking a 4 year break from djing she’s now back playing shows in Los Angeles regularly and will be playing in Chicago mid April.

Keep up with her tour dates via her instagram @knivesinsideher

https://soundcloud.com/knivesinsideher

https://linktr.ee/knivesinsideher

Ahead of Distorted Disco with Rhys Fulber and Blush Response December 9th 2023 in Downtown LA, one of the night's founding members, Jeff Swearengin aka Sleep Clinic, offers up this mix keeping his spirit and energy in the night even after relocating outside of Los Angeles. Listen now or on the way to Distorted Disco on Saturday. Tickets available at LAINDUSTRIAL.ORG

Tollefson cut her teeth as a DJ in the local Seattle scene for several years before making her way down the West Coast to LA in 2020. Those who have seen her spin can attest to her versatility as a DJ. Tollefson is able to curate sets that range from deep, hypnotic techno openers to peak-time ravey techno performances.

Dahlia Fae is a multifaceted artist, excelling as a music producer, video artist, and DJ. Within the realm of her creative pursuits, she demonstrates an exceptional skill for intertwining music and analog video art. She skillfully crafts art that explores profound themes of intense emotions, identity, intimacy, and spirituality, sparking contemplation and introspection.

Dahlia Fae's artistic toolkit has no limits, encompassing a diverse spectrum of mediums, from the intricate workings of modular synthesizers and the complexities of computer programming to the nostalgic allure of circuit-bent equipment from the 80s and the evocative sentimentality of tape machines. Her artistic tapestry is a testament to her innovative spirit and unwavering dedication to pushing artistic boundaries.

Throughout the 2010s, she fully immersed herself in New York City's dynamic LGBT+ rave scene, simultaneously crafting a diverse collection of experimental music and art that spanned various genres.

With her current base in Los Angeles, Dahlia Fae stands as a significant driving force within the local creative landscape. Furthermore, she extends her influence beyond borders, showcasing her talents on the global stage through her mesmerizing performances.

https://soundcloud.com/dahliafae

https://ra.co/dj/dahliafae

https://soundcloud.com/laindustrial/sets/la-industrial

A mix curated by Sleep Clinic for the patio at Distorted Disco August 11th 2023 - Liebknecht / Cervello Elettronico / Fu5k4 / Naked Aggression DJ / Spheric

A mix curated by Sleep Clinic for the patio at Distorted Disco August 11th 2023 - Liebknecht / Cervello Elettronico / Fu5k4 / Naked Aggression DJ / Spheric

Currently residing in the bleak sun of Southern California FRACTURED ARMOUR unearths wounds and techniques in his own tracks and sets buried in dark atmospheric noise and metal rhythms/ hate filled kicks and outer dimensional synths. A sound signature in constant evolution and exploration since it’s conception in late 2021.

https://linktr.ee/fracturedarmour

https://fracturedarmour.bandcamp.com

Theed3vil is a duo based out of East L.A. Crafting high-energy rhythms that traverse genres from pulsating electro to heavy gritty techno. Drawing inspiration from all across the sonic spectrum, and incorporating elements of breakbeat, hyper-pop, psytrance, ghetto-tech, EBM, and electro. Influence by Silent Servant, Helena Hauf, Skinny Puppy, Lweski, W1b0, L.F.T.

Originating from Los Angeles, Mr Michel has his hands in everything. Playing at all kinds of events from Techno, House, Acid House, Electro, Italo Disco, EBM, Industrial, Goth, Synth, to Dark Wave, while using vinyl and digital disciplines in his sets. Inspired by the heavily influential sounds of Detroit and Chicago, The Berlin rave culture helps mold and inspire a unique electronic sound that gives depth into every performance Mr Michel lays out. Having a career that has spanned over a decade in the LA’s electronic scene has given him the unique opportunity to showcase his passion for music in a multitude of settings from dive bars to underground warehouses and everything in between.

https://www.instagram.com/djmrmichel

https://www.mixcloud.com/deejaymichel

West, the Wild Card of the Technoids Residents, known for her completely unique twist on delivering hard "boom-boom's" to the LA techno crowd. West has curated a unique style that incorporates jaunty and effervescent melodies, groovy and bouncy and deep rhythms, acid baselines, and use of dreamy and transcendental samples.

With some deep-rooted influence from Tekno, acid-core, neo-rave and 90's trance, West is like sunshine and rainbows, spinning both popular hits and obscure gold to paint the dancefloor with candyfloss and bubblegum grooves that never fails to deliver the hard or the fast.

West always brings the high-energy, feel-good vibes with her mixing. She brings such refreshing uniqueness, that her style needed to be given a name of its own: Dream-Core.

A Boston native, Dekkatess started DJing with Infra, the up-and-coming collective gaining traction for their intimate events and passion for quality techno. She has since relocated to Los Angeles where she remains a devotee of the underground. For the last 2 years, many of her sets have showcased her favorite hard techno and more downtempo industrial selections. Today, Dekkatess is eager and grateful to share some of these sounds with the LA Industrial community.

A mix curated for Distorted Disco 2.23.23

Damascus Knives gives us a mix ahead of Portion Control's debut live performance in Los Angeles with Stromkern at Zebulon on Thursday September 22nd 2022.

They will be spinning along with DJs Pre Op Trans and Less Than Human.

Doors at 8PM - just under $25 presale with fees included

2478 Fletcher Dr, Los Angeles, CA 90039, USA

https://www.facebook.com/events/1948519078683802

https://dice.fm/event/malnv-portion-control-stromkern-22nd-sep-zebulon-los-angeles-tickets

PORTION CONTROL

with STROMKERN

+ DJs Pre Op Trans , Less Than Human (UK), and Damascus Knives

Zynische has been DJing since 2017 and is a Resident Dj at Dance of Youth, the "Noir Clubbing" held in Verona.

She collaborates with various national and international clubs/festivals and her selections focus on Post-punk, Minimal Wave, New wave and Goth, sinking their roots in the 80s getting to more contemporary sounds.

https://www.facebook.com/Zynische
